verbose_text: The T g of lignin is affected by its molecular weight, crosslinking structure, and hydrogen bonds.29, 56 Grafting DGE to lignin reduces the number of available hydroxy groups that can partake in hydrogen bonding.27 As more DGE was attached to KL, its structure became less condensed and its entanglement ability with the aliphatic chain was reduced, which caused a reduction in T g.
evidence: hydrogen bonds.29, 56 Grafting DGE to lignin reduces the number of available hydroxy
